thread.title: Gingrich: The CBO Is Dishonest, Corrupt, and Should Be Abolished
thread.title_full: Gingrich: The CBO Is Dishonest, Corrupt, and Should Be Abolished

author: Josh Feldman
title: Gingrich: The CBO Is Dishonest, Corrupt, and Should Be Abolished
text:
Gingrich: The CBO Is Dishonest, Corrupt, and Should Be Abolished by Josh Feldman | 8:04   . @newtgingrich : “They should abolish the Congressional Budget Office. It is corrupt, it is dishonest, it was totally wrong on #Obamacare .” pic.twitter.com/T2ZclPBN5o 
— Fox News (@FoxNews) March 13, 2017 
In response to the Congressional Budget Office report out today about the American Health Care Act, former House Speaker Newt Gingrich said tonight that it’s time for the CBO to be abolished. 
He told Fox’s Martha MacCallum , “They should abolish the Congressional Budget Office. It is corrupt, it is dishonest, it was totally wrong on Obamacare by huge, huge margins. I don’t trust a single word they have published and I don’t believe them.” 
He proposed replacing it by going out to “three to five professional firms [to] score these things.” 
Back in January, before Trump was inaugurated, Gingrich also made a case for the CBO to be abolished, saying it’s “incompatible with the Trump era.” 
Watch above, via Fox News. 
[ image via screengrab ]
